languages.text: Note: damaging psyker powers count as weapon attacks, counting toward the normal attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gaining all the benefits of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} increasing the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of attacks. For example, a Soldier using the {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g} ability will be able to use damaging psyker powers twice per turn, and an Operative's {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Analyse Enemies{/g} ability affects the damage of damaging psyker powers.

traits.locale_text: Note: damaging psyker powers count as weapon attacks, counting toward the normal attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and gaining all the benefits of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} increasing the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of attacks. For example, a Soldier using the Run and Gun ability will be able to use damaging psyker powers twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, and an Operative's Analyse Enemies ability affects the damage of damaging psyker powers.

Note: damaging psyker powers count as weapon attacks, counting toward the normal attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gaining all the benefits of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} increasing the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of attacks. For example, a Soldier using the Run and Gun ability will be able to use damaging psyker powers twice per turn, and an Operative's Analyse Enemies ability affects the damage of damaging psyker powers.

Note: damaging psyker powers count as weapon attacks, counting toward the normal attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gaining all the benefits of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} increasing the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of attacks. For example, a Soldier using the Run and Gun ability will be able to use damaging psyker powers twice per turn, and an Operative's Analyse Enemies ability affects the damage of damaging psyker powers.

languages.text: 注意：伤害性灵能能力同样算作武器攻击，会记入每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}攻击次数上限，也会享受{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}所有的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}加成效果。例如，使用{g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}奔袭射击{/g}技能的角色，可以在该回合内使用两次伤害性灵能能力。特工的{g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}分析敌人{/g}技能也同样会影响伤害性灵能能力造成的伤害。
languages.original_text: Note: damaging psyker powers count as weapon attacks, counting toward the normal attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gaining all the benefits of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} increasing the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of attacks. For example, a Soldier using the {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g} ability will be able to use damaging psyker powers twice per turn, and an Operative's {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Analyse Enemies{/g} ability affects the damage of damaging psyker powers.

traits.locale_text: 注意：伤害性灵能能力同样算作武器攻击，会记入每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}攻击次数上限，也会享受{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}所有的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}加成效果。例如，使用奔袭射击技能的角色，可以在该{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内使用两次伤害性灵能能力，而{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}的分析敌人技能，也同样会影响伤害性灵能能力造成的伤害。

注意：伤害性灵能能力同样算作武器攻击，会记入每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}攻击次数上限，也会享受{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}所有的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}加成效果。例如，使用奔袭射击技能的角色，可以在该回合内使用两次伤害性灵能能力。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}的分析敌人技能也同样会影响伤害性灵能能力造成的伤害。

languages.text: Hinweis: Schädigende psionische Kräfte zählen als Waffenangriffe, die auf das normale Angriffslimit pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} angerechnet werden und alle Vorteile von {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talenten{/g}, die den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} von Angriffen erhöhen, erhalten. Zum Beispiel wird ein Soldat, der die Fähigkeit {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Laufen und ballern{/g} einsetzt, zweimal pro Zug psionische Kräfte einsetzen können und die Fähigkeit {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Feinde analysieren{/g} eines Agenten wirkt sich auf den Schaden schädigender psionische Kräfte aus.
languages.original_text: Note: damaging psyker powers count as weapon attacks, counting toward the normal attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gaining all the benefits of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} increasing the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of attacks. For example, a Soldier using the {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g} ability will be able to use damaging psyker powers twice per turn, and an Operative's {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Analyse Enemies{/g} ability affects the damage of damaging psyker powers.

traits.locale_text: Hinweis: Schädigende psionische Kräfte zählen als Waffenangriffe, die auf das normale Angriffslimit pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} angerechnet werden und alle Vorteile von {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talenten{/g}, die den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} von Angriffen erhöhen, erhalten. Zum Beispiel wird ein Soldat, der die Fähigkeit Laufen und ballern einsetzt, zweimal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} psionische Kräfte einsetzen können und die Fähigkeit Feinde analysieren eines {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agenten{/g} wirkt sich auf den Schaden schädigender psionische Kräfte aus.

languages.text: Примечание: наносящие урон силы псайкера считаются атаками с помощью оружия для расчета лимита атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} и получают все преимущества от {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантов{/g}, увеличивающих {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от атак. Например, солдат, использующий способность {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Стрельба на бегу{/g}, может применять наносящие урон силы псайкера дважды за ход, а {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Анализ целей{/g} оперативника влияет на урон от псайкерских сил.
languages.original_text: Note: damaging psyker powers count as weapon attacks, counting toward the normal attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gaining all the benefits of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} increasing the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of attacks. For example, a Soldier using the {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g} ability will be able to use damaging psyker powers twice per turn, and an Operative's {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Analyse Enemies{/g} ability affects the damage of damaging psyker powers.

traits.locale_text: Примечание: наносящие урон силы псайкера считаются атаками с помощью оружия для расчета лимита атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} и получают все преимущества от {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантов{/g}, увеличивающих {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от атак. Например, солдат, использующий способность {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Стрельба на бегу{/g}, может применять наносящие урон силы псайкера дважды за ход, а {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Анализ целей{/g} оперативника влияет на урон от псайкерских сил.

Примечание: наносящие урон силы псайкера считаются атаками с помощью оружия для расчета лимита атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} и получают все преимущества от {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантов{/g}, увеличивающих {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от атак. Например, стрелок, использующий способность Стрельба на бегу, может применять наносящие урон силы псайкера дважды за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, а Изучение целей {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}адепта{/g} влияет на урон от псайкерских сил.

languages.text: Remarque : les pouvoirs de psyker qui infligent des dégâts sont considérés comme des attaques effectuées avec des armes. Ils sont comptabilisés dans le nombre maximum d'attaques par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} et bénéficient de tous les bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} augmentant les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des attaques. Par exemple, un soldat ayant recours à la capacité {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Tir à la volée{/g} pourra utiliser des pouvoirs de psyker infligeant des dégâts deux fois par tour, et l'{g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Analyse des ennemis{/g} d'un agent affectera les dégâts infligés par les pouvoirs de psyker.
languages.original_text: Note: damaging psyker powers count as weapon attacks, counting toward the normal attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gaining all the benefits of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} increasing the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of attacks. For example, a Soldier using the {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g} ability will be able to use damaging psyker powers twice per turn, and an Operative's {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Analyse Enemies{/g} ability affects the damage of damaging psyker powers.

traits.locale_text: Remarque : les pouvoirs de psyker qui infligent des dégâts sont considérés comme des attaques effectuées avec des armes. Ils sont comptabilisés dans le nombre maximum d'attaques par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} et bénéficient de tous les bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} augmentant les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des attaques. Par exemple, un soldat ayant recours à la capacité Tir à la volée pourra utiliser des pouvoirs de psyker infligeant des dégâts deux fois par tour, et l'Analyse des ennemis d'un agent affectera les dégâts infligés par les pouvoirs de psyker.

languages.text: Nota: los poderes psíquicos dañinos cuentan como ataques con arma, por lo que están incluidos en el límite de ataques por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} y se benefician de cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} que aumente el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de ataques. Por ejemplo, un soldado que use {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Disparo a la carrera{/g} podrá usar poderes psíquicos dañinos dos veces por turno, mientras que un agente que use la capacidad {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Analizar enemigos{/g} afectará al daño de poderes psíquicos dañinos.
languages.original_text: Note: damaging psyker powers count as weapon attacks, counting toward the normal attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gaining all the benefits of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} increasing the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of attacks. For example, a Soldier using the {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g} ability will be able to use damaging psyker powers twice per turn, and an Operative's {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Analyse Enemies{/g} ability affects the damage of damaging psyker powers.

traits.locale_text: Nota: los poderes psíquicos dañinos cuentan como ataques con arma, por lo que están incluidos en el límite de ataques por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} y se benefician de cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} que aumente el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de ataques. Por ejemplo, un soldado que use Disparo a la carrera podrá usar poderes psíquicos dañinos dos veces por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, mientras que un {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g} que use la capacidad Analizar enemigos afectará al daño de poderes psíquicos dañinos.

languages.text: 注意：ダメージを与える異能者の力は、武器攻撃とみなされます。これにより、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ごとの通常攻撃回数にカウントされ、攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を増加させる{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}の恩恵をすべて得られます。例えば、ソルジャーが速攻攻撃のアビリティを使用していると、ダメージを与える異能者の力を1ターンに2回使用できるようになり、オペレーターの敵の分析アビリティは、ダメージを与える異能者の力のダメージに影響します。
languages.original_text: Note: damaging psyker powers count as weapon attacks, counting toward the normal attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gaining all the benefits of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} increasing the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of attacks. For example, a Soldier using the Run and Gun ability will be able to use damaging psyker powers twice per turn, and an Operative's Analyse Enemies ability affects the damage of damaging psyker powers.

traits.locale_text: 注意：ダメージを与える異能者の力は、武器攻撃とみなされます。これにより、{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとの通常攻撃回数にカウントされ、攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を増加させる{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}の恩恵をすべて得られます。例えば、ソルジャーがラン＆ガンアビリティを使用していると、ダメージを与える異能者の力を1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に2回使用できるようになり、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}の敵の分析アビリティは、ダメージを与える異能者の力のダメージに影響します。

languages.text: Not: Hasar veren ruhsezer güçleri, silah saldırısı olarak değerlendirilir; {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} başına normal saldırı sınırından sayılır ve saldırıların verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} artıran {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}becerilerin{/g} tüm faydalarından yararlanır. Örneğin {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Fırla ve Mıhla{/g} kabiliyetini kullanan bir Asker, hasar veren ruhsezer güçlerini her turda iki kez kullanabilir ve Ajan'ın {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Düşmanı Analiz Et{/g} kabiliyeti hasar veren ruhsezer güçlerinin vereceği hasarı etkiler.
languages.original_text: Note: damaging psyker powers count as weapon attacks, counting toward the normal attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gaining all the benefits of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} increasing the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of attacks. For example, a Soldier using the {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g} ability will be able to use damaging psyker powers twice per turn, and an Operative's {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Analyse Enemies{/g} ability affects the damage of damaging psyker powers.
